mapper.select: select year(operation_time) as year,count(*) as person_num,sex from hospital_business h join person p on h.social_security_card=p.social_security_card where h.operation='住院登记' group by sex,year order by year,sex
select year(operation_time) as year,area as area,count(*) as person_num from hospital_business where operation='住院登记' group by year,area order by year,area
select year(operation_time) as year,count(*) as person_num from hospital_business where operation='住院登记' group by year order by year

select year(operation_time) as year, case when(year(operation_time)-year(birthday)>65) then '老年' when(year(operation_time)-year(birthday)>40) then '中年' when(year(operation_time)-year(birthday)>6) then '青年' else '儿童' end as age, count(*) as person_num
from hospital_business h right join person p on h.social_security_card=p.social_security_card where operation='住院登记' group by year,age order by year,age
select year(operation_time) as year,hospital as hos_name,count(*) as person_num from hospital_business where operation='住院登记' group by year,hos_name order by year,person_num desc
select year(operation_time) as year,department as dep_name, count(*) as person_num from hospital_business where operation='住院登记' group by year,dep_name order by year,person_num
select year(operation_time) as year,doctor as doc_name, count(*) as person_num from hospital_business where operation='住院登记' group by year,doc_name order by year,person_num
